content: Pattakkaaran:- (padinyaarottu thirinyu rooshmaa cheythukond) pithaavaam daivatthinte snehavum…
Pattakkaaran :- (kaikall uyartthikkond) ee naazhikayil naam ellaavarudeyum bodhangallum…
Janam :- nyangallude bodhangallum vichaarangallum hrdayangallum daivamaaya kartthaavingkal irikkunnu.
Janam :- bhayabhakthiyode kartthaavine sthothram cheyyunnathu yukthavum nyaayavum aakunnu.

Janam :- thante sthuthikallaal aakaashavum bhoomiyum niranyirikkunna balavaanaaya daivamthampuraan parishuddhan, parishuddhan, parishuddhan, uyarangallil ooshaana. Daivamaaya kartthaavinte thirunaamatthil vannavanum varuvaanirikkunnavanumaayavan vaazhtthappettavanaakunnu. Uyarangallil sthuthi.

Janam :- nyangallude kartthaave! Ninte maranatthe nyangall orkkukayum ninte uyirtthezhunnelpine nyangall ettu parayukayum ninte randaamatthe ezhunnallllatthinaayi nyangall nokkippaarkkukayum cheyyunnu. Ninte anugra hangall nyangall ellaavarude melum undaayirikkename.

Mautthoku moraan mesa-hadeenaan
Vabayomathok-maude-naan
Valmeseesok-hoyu dthartthen msaa-kkenaan
Virahamaykku nehavun-al koolaan.

Naathhaa! Nin mrthiyortthengall
Nin uththhaanamathe-ttothi
Kaakkunnu nin punaraa-gamanam,
Vaazhavarulluka - nyangall-kkellaam.

Janam :- sarvvashakthiyulllla pithaavaam daivame, nyangallodu karuna cheyyaname. Daivamaaya kartthaave, ninne nyangall sthuthikkukayum vaazhtthukayum vandikkukayum ninnodu nyangall apekshikkukayum cheyyunnu. Utthamanaayullllove! Karuna thonni nyangalludemel anugraham cheyyaname.

Shushrooshakkaaran :- baarekmor, ente vaathsalyamullllavare, jeevanulllla parishuddha roohaa, svargamaakunna melulllla uyarangallilninnu prathaapatthodukoodi irangi, vaykkappettirikkunna ee parishuddha kurbbaanamel porunni aavasichu athine shuddheekarikkunna ee naazhika ethra bhayangkaravum, ee samayam ethra bhramikkatthakkathumaakunnu. Ningall adakkatthodum bhayatthodum ninnukondu praarththhippin.
Janam :- nyangallellaavarodumkoode samaadhaanavum nyanga llkkellaavarkkum sampreethiyum undaayirikkename.
